reviews.review_msg: Sincere and works hard to make the learning experience relevent to each student's individual interests.  A unique and healthy sense of humour.

Picked favorites at the start of the term. Prefers students already versant in lit crit. jargon. Unhelpful when approached for individual help.  Seemed to begrudge the "A" my term paper earned.  My success as a PhD is in spite of him, not becaus
